product_name: SmartWool Lightweight Stripe Sweater - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: Don't let the name fool you; the men's SmartWool Lightweight Stripe Sweater packs a punch. It's relaxed enough for serious downtime yet refined enough for dinner out, and easily layers up. Made of soft, nonirritating merino wool, this sweater insulates, wicks away moisture and resists odors-naturally. SmartWool Lightweight Stripe Sweater for men features a relaxed fit and classic crew styling, with stripes on the body for style. Knit back wraps slightly over the shoulders and at the side seams for a body enhancing fit. Features an engraved metal logo tab. Machine washable; lay flat to dry. Special buy.
short_description: Don't let the name fool you; the men's SmartWool Lightweight Stripe Sweater packs a punch. It's relaxed enough for serious downtime yet refined enough for dinner out, and easily layers up.
